free_text.Learning outcomes: To analyze and discuss innovative designs of contemporary structures.
free_text.Content: Topics: [br/][li] General design concepts, understanding a structure's function[br/][li] The role of history (previous examples, evolution of structural concepts)[br/][li] Structural aspects and detailing of contemporary structures[br/][li] Structural design of contemporary structures, and role of parameter variation [br/]
free_text.Keywords: Structural design, contemporary structures, design concepts, structural detailing
